content: if you re in the mood for an easy sweater pattern you really can t beat the simple construction of a cocoon cardigan sweater it s hard to believe that a basic rectangle can produce such a cozy relaxed shape isn t it but it s true so whether you re newer to crochet or you just want a mindless project that will add something beautiful to your wardrobe give this one a try for reference my model is wearing the xs/s/m size with a petite modification the petite modification which is noted within the pattern removes 4 from the overall length that s helpful when you re only 4 9
